message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent cut. Accept and we're done!
I'll take a smaller share now, but I'm hoping to do better next round. The value of money is already going down, let's be realistic!
Okay, I'll lower my share a bit more. But this is my final offer. Accept it before the value of our money drops even further!
I'm not going to give up yet. I think I can get a better deal. Your turn to decide!
